title: Built a Qt-based EduAPP
description: Users can learn how to write Chinese characters and use the integrated ChatGPT to craft Chinese characters from radicals.

title: A Simple Physical Engine
description: Simulate physical animation by using spring-mass system

title: Built a Qt-based Pixel Art Tool
description: Created a custom pixel editor with C++ and Qt, allowing advanced sprite editing.

title: Built a Spread Sheet
description: Users can input formula with dependence, and program can calculate the result or display warning. Data can save in XML format

title: RayTracing By Python
description: A simple ray tracing program based on Python's Taichi library. Taichi allows computations to be performed on the GPU.

title: Houdini AI Rendering
description: Get Houdini GL view's picture, and feed it to Stable Diffusion's ControlNet. It lets AI to render 3D objects.

title: Houdini Model to LEGO
description: Turn any model in to LEGO blocks and blast them!
